![Scott Green](https://burlingtonwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=6663 "Scott Green")

Scott K. Green
==============

[City Council](https://burlingtonwa.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=10)  
Title: Councilmember  
Phone: [360-755-0531](tel:3607550531)

  
  

Current Term: January 1, 2024 - December 31, 2027

This is Scott Green's second term serving as Councilmember for Ward 1.

Scott presently serves as Chair of the Americans with Disabilities Committee and Audit & Finance Committee and as an alternate for the Public Works Committee and Downtown Burlington Association.
